version_description:
Unsplash photo search! The most beautiful free images available.

New hand-picked image library for when you need photo ideas (find it under the “Free Photos” button).

Also new:
- Spacing bug fix
- Crash fixes
- Improved support for iPhone XR and XS Max

Tons of new features and styles are coming!

Follow us on Instagram @sliderapp.co for tutorials, inspiration and more!

Feedback? Email us at feedback@sliderapp.co

- NOW WITH STORIES! Export your creations in Stories 9x16 format by choosing Stories on the first screen.
- Easier slide navigation, bug fixes and more!

Keep an eye out for new styles coming soon!

Follow us on Instagram @sliderapp.co for tutorials, inspiration and more!

Feedback? Email us anytime at feedback@sliderapp.co :)

- Two brand new styles! Introducing Quotable and Reverie. More styles coming soon :)
- Fixed a crash when deleting text
- Fixed a bug with text selection and resizing

Bug fixes:
- Fixed a bug in Stories templates which made images display oddly
- Fixed a bug that didn't allow you to delete single letters
- Fixed a bug that didn't allow you to navigate slides after tapping on the edit screen multiple times
- Fixed a bug with iCloud images not exporting correctly

We’re so excited to officially launch Story Swag and share it with you! In addition to the new name, this update includes major updates:
* 38 beautiful new fonts! Each template gets its own designer fonts for a custom look.
* 8 brand-new templates: Bloom, Snapshot, Fresco, Gallery, Fizz, Filmframe, Boxed, and Terrazzo!
* An overall smoother, easier app experience
* Also, in this 3.01 update, we did some bug fixing

Let us know what you think! Email us anytime at feedback@storyswag.co :)

We’re so excited to officially launch Story Swag and share it with you! Here’s our latest update:
* Crop your images as small as you like
* Select the same image multiple times
* Bug fixes and more
Let us know what you think! Email us anytime at feedback@storyswag.co :slightly_smiling_face:

Now add beautiful free videos to your slideshows and stories! We’ve also improved the select media screen to make it easier to find the perfect photo or video.

- New: Add amazing free videos!
- New: Introducing three new templates: Lifted, Paper Tear, and Fifty/Fifty
- New: Support for Arabic 
- Fixed: Video exports look better than ever
- Bugfixes and performance improvements

Follow us on Instagram @storyswagapp for tutorials, inspiration, and more!

Feedback? We’d love to hear it! Email us at feedback@storyswag.co
